support.title: COFFEE MUG CLUB MUG
support.descp: Custom locally created ceramic mug that will be on display at the self serve coffee station with your name on it. All mug club members will receive $1 coffee and free refills! Plus you'll receive a #SAVEGAIA Tshirt and sticker!

support.title: ONE YEAR COFFEE MUG CLUB
support.descp: Custom locally created ceramic mug that will be on display at the self serve coffee station with your name on it. All forever mug club members will receive free coffee and free refills for one year as well as discounted pricing on the coffee mug club annual renewals! Plus you'll receive a #SAVEGAIA Tshirt and sticker!

support.title: GAIA CAFE ON LOCATION DINNER PARTY
support.descp: Join up to 25 of your friends for a dinner party at the new location for a dinner party of your hand picked Gaia Cafe favorites! Includes Gaia Cookies!

support.title: GAIA CAFE OFF LOCATION DINNER PARTY
support.descp: Enjoy a Gaia catered event at your home or special location! Invite up to 30 friends and enjoy a relaxing night of being served. Gaia cookies included!

support.title: SPECIAL EVENT CATERING
support.descp: Having a wedding, holiday party, or other special event coming up? Let Gaia Cafe cater for you and up to 100 guests!

support.title: MEALS FOR A YEAR
support.descp: If you love Gaia Cafe as much as we do, you're going to LOVE this deal! Receive a specialty card that will give you a FREE meal everyday of the year for one year! Don't plan on coming in every day? No problem, you can roll your days over as much as you need to collect all 365 perfected meals!

support.title: House Show+Kitchen sink
support.descp: I will personally (solo) come do a house show for you and your friends or family, next time I'm in your area. We will coordinate on our schedules and make somthing that works for us both. This can be all sorts of fun. I'm going to limit this to the USA excluding Hawaii and Alaska. Plus i will send you the CD before hand so you can learn all the words and sing along. Also included, the 2014 Album 'Alpine Way' CD, a t-shirt, an email with the Acoustic Demos Nathan recorded solo. this reward will probably come with an awkward side hug and some strange stories.

updates.update_content: Here's a final reminder for the cookout tomorrow at 2 pm. It's going to be at 852 Wealthy SE in Grand Rapids. Hopefully the posts earlier in the week have got you psyched for all we've got planned. The restaurant will be closed so we can devote all our efforts to thanking you for your donations. See you tomorrow at 2!

Hey y'all, The cookout for donors at the $35 level and above is tomorrow as mentioned earlier in the week and here's the address: 852 Wealthy St SE Grand Rapids, Mi 49506 We hope to see you there! And for everyone who has other prizes due their way, our shirts are being printed so we will be able to send those out soon. The magnets and postcards are just now hot off the press and the cookbooks are headed that way, too. Thanks again for all your support!

Hey yall,
The cookout for all our donors at the $35 level and above will be this Sunday. We just wanted to put the word out a few days early so you can save space in your schedule this weekend. It will be held in Grand Rapids, probably near the Heritage Hill neighborhood, but we haven't found a sure site yet.
The cookout will start at 2 p.m. and go all afternoon and evening. Looking forward to seeing you all there!

project_data.project_name: Bartertown Diner: Cooking Towards A Better Tomorrow!

campaign.story:
Hi,
We're a group that has been making original musical theater, following the burlesque format, in Michigan for 5 years now. We stage massive theatrical monstrosities with a massive cast, live band, costumes, stunts, jokes, in cool restored Vaudeville theaters, outdoor venues, and dive bars. We're different from a lot of burlesque because the music is original and written specifically for the dancers, every show also follows a theme and tells a story. Think Gilbert and Sullivan meets Rocky Horror!
The time has come for us to spread the Super Happy all over the country. We will be spending some of July and all of August on the road, performing our show at venues all over the US of A.
To take a 25 member cast, crew, and band on the road is an amazing task for a work of DIY underground theater. We need to rent an RV.
Why an RV? Its a dressing room on wheels. We can't perform in jeans and t shirts. We need to be clean and pretty in our fantastic costumes. When we show up for a gig we show up 4 hours early, thats not gonna work when we're driving 6-8 hours in between shows. We need a room on wheels we can prepare in, and live in, while we're undertaking this project. We need to fill it with gas, pay the electricity costs for the generator, keep it filled with water, and keep the fridge full of eggs and bacon. Renting and fueling an RV for a month costs an insane amount of money!!!!
For a show like ours to hit the road seems nearly impossible but we're going to do it, we have to do it. If you're one of our thousands of fans in Michigan you know why we've got to do this and we hope you can help!!
Here are some ways you can learn more about us:
our myspace (contains lots of video samples of our show): http://www.myspace.com/superhappyfuntimeburlesque
our website: http://www.superhappyfuntimeburlesque.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/group.php...
***VIP TOUR KICK OFF SHOW IS ON JULY 29 AT THE WEALTHY THEATRE!!!!***
And here is our tour schedule:
2010 Summer Tour!!!
August 4, VNUK'S LOUNGE, Milwaukee, Wisconsin
August 5, The Vault, Minneapolis, Minnesota
August 6, The Blue Moose, Iowa City, Iowa
August 7, Club David, Sioux Falls, South Dakota
August 8, The Vaudeville Mews, Des Moines, Iowa
August 11, Knickerbockers, Lincoln, Nebraska
August 12, Granada Theater, Lawrence, Kansas
August 13, Record Bar, Kansas City, Missouri
August 14, The Triple Nickel, Colorado Springs, Colorado
August 15, Hi Dive, Denver, Colorado
August 18, Bash Riprocks, Lubbock, Texas
August 19, Launchpad, Albuquerque, New Mexico
August 20, 910 Live, Tempe, Arizona
August 21, Orpheum Theater, Flagstaff, Arizona
August 22, MBar, Los Angeles, California, 11pm
August 25, TRiP, Santa Monica, California
August 26, DNA Lounge, San Francisco, California
August 28, Reno, Nevada
August 29, Aruba Theater, Las Vegas, Nevada
August 30, Burts Tiki Lounge, Salt Lake City, Utah
August 31 Omaha, Nebraska
Sept 1 St Louis?
"As a collective performance constructed from a super-concentration of talent, mostly harvested in the Grand Rapids area, Super Happy Funtime Burlesque says anything, shows almost everything, and makes fun of anyone. And they do it very well. Some easily chalk it up as mere entertainment. But, at the end of the show, for every pair of hands that come together as result of being satisfactorily entertained, there is another whose clap is a thank you for provoking liberation of thought; a dissection of convention. In this regard, Super Happy Funtime Burlesque has been successful in cementing its status as one of the most unique destinations in West Michigan." -Drew A. Storey

updates.update_content: One last push, a live striptease show on Ustream tonight at 9:30pm!! We will be taking clothes of for dollars at this weblink live on camera with your requests: http://www.ustream.tv/channel/on-tour-super-happy-funtime-burlesque

yeah, I know we've hit our goal but that don't mean we ain't gonna stop trying for more cash!!
Tonight's burlesque rehearsal is our last before the fundraiser is officially over so, to commemorate, we will be broadcasting live via ustream! http://www.ustream.tv/channel/on-tour-super-happy-funtime-burlesque
we will be taking our clothes off for pledges and pledge increases, isn't that terrible? Its like a webcam show on the porn sites that people pay for...

First, thank you!!
Second, here's how we'll be getting you your stuff:
Anyone who purchased a ticket for the July 29 show, your name will be at the door with a "+" for however many tickets you bought. For example, Johnny Alexander spent 100 bucks on tickets so his name will be at the door like this: "Johnny Alexander, 4 tickets total".

From now (thursday at noon) till Friday at midnight, REVUE Magazine is going to match, dollar for dollar, every pledge we receive up to $1000!!!
Make your pledge immediately, help us double our money in the next 36 hours!!!
5 of these available, the Madcap Coffee pledge!! 50 bucks gets you two tickets to the VIP show at the Wealthy Theatre on July 29th and a pound of fabulous Madcap Coffee!!!!!!!!!

I must've flubbed this one a bit ago but now its up!! The Thriller! Chiller! ticket package is live, your donation gets you tickets to both SHFB and the Thriller! Chiller! film festival! Also, I added the "I'm a badass" package. That one gets you everything on the page plus a lot more...

Local magazine, REVUE, has featured our humble crew and our fundraising efforts in their newest issue. They even put us on the cover!!!
Check it out here: http://content.yudu.com/Library/A1o7lu/RevueMagazineJuly201/resources/index.htm...
